node.doctext: The alert-on-type code for the message inbox that has been removed (jan-12-2003)
node.code: onkeypress="var mylen = new String(document.form1.message.value); if(mylen.length > 255) alert(\'You can only have up to 255 characters in this field. You currently have \'+ String(mylen.length) + \'. If you send this message now, some characters will be truncated.\');"
node.title: Message Inbox box length warning
